name: Chrono (itch) (PaperAero555)
description:
there is only one bar.

it represents your health

and your ammunition

and your currency

to restore it you need to collect time flowers

enemies are lured by its scent

use your sword to eliminate enemies in exchange for some time

if there are enemies attacking your base, time will diminish faster and stop the growth of the flowers

consume time to instantly grow all of the flowers, gain a new plantation, or nuke the whole screen.
